meanings.definition: A short, sharp cry or bark.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's yelps woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent2: The yelps of the small dog could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The yelps of the squirrel made the cat curious.
meanings.sent4: The yelps of the coyote echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The yelps of the baby bird brought its mother flying back.

meanings.definition: To utter a short, sharp cry or bark.
meanings.sent1: The dog yelps when it wants attention.
meanings.sent2: She yelps in surprise when the balloon popped.
meanings.sent3: He yelps with joy as he wins the game.
meanings.sent4: The child yelps with excitement at the sight of the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent5: The cat yelps in protest as it gets a bath.
